job.title: Software Engineer, Experimentation
job.description: At DoorDash were building the most reliable delivery network to support our threesided marketplace of consumers merchants and dashers To evolve this network and the experiences built on top of it were bringing on experienced experimentation engineers to enable us to ship and measure new features with confidence and claritybrbrThe Experimentation Platform team builds infrastructure libraries automation and processes to support world class experimentation and analysis We are increasing our trust in our product data by enforcing a schema and reporting on the health of our pipeline Future projects include generalized tracking libraries across our tech stack developing the next generation of our experimentation framework building tools to manage our experiment ecosystem and enabling experiments to target specific cohorts of usersbrbrstronguWhat Youll DobrustrongulliEvolve DoorDash towards automated feature management  Push forward our tooling and systems towards a North Star of automating new feature release and analysisliliBuild and integrate tools  Accelerate the launch and analysis of new features with tooling that makes experimentation easy to implement and understandliliOwn your work  Youll be a founding member of the experimentation team and responsible for helping to form the experimentation platform roadmapliliGovern data  Build and support tooling to ensure the accuracy of our product dataliliInfluence the organization  Youll partner with engineers throughout the organization to help configure and plan successful experiments and tracking plansbrliulstronguWhat Were Looking Forbrustrongulli5 years of industry experienceliliExperience architecting largescale applicationsliliUnderstanding of REST principles and experience working with and implementing backend APIsliliKnowledge of CS fundamental conceptsliliA passion for analyzing data to inform decisionsliliGrowthmindset and eagerness to expand your skill setliliAdaptability resiliency and the ability to thrive in ambiguity  things change quicklyliliYou celebrate your successes but also admit your missteps and learn from feedback  were all humanbrliulstrongNice To HavebrstrongulliUnderstanding of statistical analysisliliExperience scaling experimentation systemsliliExperience developing and socializing libraries in large organizationsliliBS in Computer Science Computer Engineering IT or related fieldliliAndroid or iOS experiencebrliulWhy Youll Love Working at DoorDashbrulliWe are leaders  Leadership is not limited to our management team Its something everyone at DoorDash embraces and embodiesliliWe are doers  We believe the only way to predict the future is to build it Creating solutions that will lead our company and our industry is what we do  on every project every day liliWe are learners  Were not afraid to dig in and uncover the truth even if its scary or inconvenient Everyone here is continually learning on the job no matter if weve been in a role for one year or one minuteliliWe are customer obsessed  Our mission is to grow and empower local economies We are committed to our customers merchants and dashers and believe in connecting people with possibilityliliWe are all DoorDash  The magic of DoorDash is our people together making our inspiring goals attainable and driving us to greater heights liliWe offer great compensation packages and comprehensive health benefitsbrliulstronguAbout DoorDashbrbrustrongDoorDash is a technology company that connects customers with their favorite local and national businesses in all 50 US states Canada and Australia Founded in 2013 DoorDash empowers merchants to grow their businesses by offering ondemand delivery datadriven insights and better instore efficiency providing delightful experiences from door to door By building the lastmile delivery infrastructure for local cities DoorDash is bringing communities closer one doorstep at a time Read more on the DoorDash Engineering blog or wwwdoordashcombrbrOur Commitment to Diversity and InclusionbrbrWere committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company industry and cities Thats why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of the best and brightest from all backgrounds experiences and perspectives We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools resources and opportunity to excelbrbrPursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance and any other state or local hiring regulations we will consider for employment any qualified applicant including those with arrest and conviction records in a manner consistent with the applicable regulationlbrbr
